title: An event triggered control scheme for enhanced production of Escherichia coli and biomass concentration during fed-batch cultivation
content:
Publication date: 30 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 12

Author(s): Chitra Murugan, Sutha Subbian, Saravanan Kaliyaperumal, Kishor Kumar Sadasivuni, Md Irfanul Haque Siddiqui, Suresh Muthusamy, Marc A. Rosen, Chander Prakash, Choon Kit Chan
